瞁字的基本解释

瞁
xù
惊视：“金、焦二客乃??然相顾，瞁然失色。”

瞁字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xù］
［《廣韻》許役切，入昔，曉。］
［《廣韻》呼狊切，入錫，曉。］
惊视貌。参见“瞁然”、“瞁歴”。

瞁字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【目字部】　瞁； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页813第11
【廣韻】許役切【集韻】呼役切，?兄入聲。驚視貌。【周邦彥汴都賦】心駭神悸，瞁䁨而不敢進。【盛恩北固山賦】瞁然失色。　又【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?呼狊切，馨入聲。義同。或作?。

瞁字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
瞁字的起名意思

暂无。

Ba
Basic explanation of words
Ba
xù
Surprised: "Jin and Jiao are looking at each other, and they lose their color."
Ba
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xù］
["Guang Yun" Xu Ya cut, into the past, Xiao. ]
["Guangyun" Hushou cut, enter the tin, dawn. ]
Surprised. See "Ba Ran", "Ba 歴".
Ba
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Concentration] [Head of Words] 　 Ba; Kangxi strokes: 14; Page number: Page 813 No. 11
[Guang Yun] Xu Yiqie [Jiyun] Call for Yiqie, brother enters the voice. Surprised. [Zhou Bangyan Bian Du Fu] Frightened and palpitated, he dare not enter. [Sheng En Beigu Mountain Fu] Painfully faded.　 [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Husse cut, Xin enters the sound. The same meaning. Or for?.
